description:
The 7th Fleet was a unit of the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets] Star Fleet, which was under the command of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch774 [Hoghwood] by 796 UC, who led it from the battleship http://anidb.net/ch96412 [Quetzalcoatl].
It took part in the massive invasion of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] that year, but was surrounded and forced to surrender to High Admiral Siegfried http://anidb.net/ch187 [Kircheis] during the Battle of Dverger.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Dai 7 Kantai
